Description: BASIC QUALIFICATIONSWe want to hire the world’s brightest minds, and offer them an environment in which they can relentlessly improve the experience for our customers.· You are currently working towards a 2+ year university degree in Logistics, Supply Chain, Production, Engineering, Business Management, or similar discipline or have graduated within the last 6 months· You must have the right to work in the country of employment by the start date· Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and the local language· You are willing to work to flexible schedules/shifts hours · You are results-driven with analytical skills and the desire to innovate and simplify current process and practices· Evidence of leadership skills – perhaps you are president of a sporting or social club at university or took the lead in a group project · You are able to demonstrate curiosity and pro-activity, which will allow you to gain greater autonomy in the course of the internship and make the most of your time with us to fully achieve your learning and development goalsPREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS• Ability to work successfully in an ambiguous environment, to meet tight deadlines and prioritize workload even when faced with conflicting priorities.• Previous work experience – a summer job, internship; if it’s an experience in a related field or business, even betterJob Details
